name: GallerySecurityTextPositionType

properties.name: CENTERED
properties.description: Text is centered on each image.

properties.name: UPPERLEFT
properties.description: Text is in the upper left corner of each image.

properties.name: LOWERLEFT
properties.description: Ltext is in the lower left corner of each image.

properties.name: UPPERRIGHT
properties.description: Text is in the upper right corner of each image.

properties.name: LOWERRIGHT
properties.description: Text is in the lower right corner of each image.

description: The position of the text displayed over gallery images as an antitheft deterrent.
